A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I watched this when it originally came out. I wanted to wait until episode 9 came out to try and give this movie a chance. I thought\, \"Maybe Disney can salvage this movie.\" However\, that is not the case. I think that cinematically this is an amazing film. The visuals and way that the movie is shot is incredible. However\, the story is bogged down. This film breaks so many aspects of the StarWars lore that it is sad. There are a lot of cheesy and uncalled for moments. At one point Leah starts to breathe in the vacuum of space for some odd reason? I could go into more\, but I digress.
